title: Cosmos Sci-Fi Ambient Music Pack
description: This is a music pack featuring nineteen science fiction instrumental tracks. Utilizing orchestral and ambient effects, all of these pieces are versatile enough to use across a wide variety of projects.
longDescription:
Music composer, Living Force is proud to present the Cosmos Sci-Fi Dark Ambient Music Pack! This is an asset pack that contains nineteen orchestral instrumentals geared towards the world of science fiction. The pieces all contain a fade-out and are loopable for desired cut scenes, action sequences, and transitions for your projects.


The following instrumentals are included with this asset pack:

Audio Preview:
